name: testz

releases.name: v1.0.0
releases.body:
![Zig Version Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Zig%20Version-0.15.1-%23f7a41d?logo=zig)

With all of the main features of library being implemented, marking this as version 1.0.0.

## Main changes
- Upgraded to work with zig 0.15.1
- Fixed Windows unicode output.
- Test skip detection now happens at runtime instead of compile-time
    - Fixes compilation issues when running projects with large test suites (~190+ tests)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/srjilarious/testz/compare/v0.6.1...v1.0.0
